content: sixteen hearts baby hat by natasha childers tashbalaz on ravelry size 14 5 circumference to fit 16 head approx 6 12 months yarn 80 metres dk weight yarn in main colour mc 20 metres dk weight yarn in contrast colour cc gauge 22sts and 30 row over 4 in stockinette needles 3 25mm us3 circular needle 40cm 4mm us6 circular needles 40 cm and 80cm or 4mm dpns notions stitch marker and darning needle abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together sts - stitches pattern cast on 80 sts on 3 25mm circular needle place marker and join for working in the round being careful not to twist your stitches ribbing knit 2 purl 2 around for 8 rounds body switch to 4mm circular needle 40cm or dpns and knit 2 rounds join the cc and work the 9 fair isle pattern row from the chart below 9 7 5 3 1 10 5 1 cut the cc yarn and continue with the mc in stockinette knit each round until the hat measures 4 5 from the cast on edge crown decreases if you are using the 40cm circular needle switch to dpns or the 80cm needle for magic loop when you have too few stitches on the needles to continue knitting comfortably round 1 knit 8 k2tog around 72sts remaining round 2 knit round 3 knit 7 k2tog around 64sts remaining round 4 knit round 5 knit 6 k2tog around 56sts remaining round 6 knit round 7 knit 5 k2tog around 48sts remaining round 8 knit 4 k2tog around 40sts remaining round 9 knit 3 k2tog around 32sts remaining round 10 knit 2 k2tog around 24sts remaining round 11 knit 1 k2tog around 16sts remaining round 12 k2tog around 8 sts remaining cut the yarn leaving an 8 inch tail draw the tail through the remaining sts on the needle and pull to close the top of the hat weave in the ends and block
